scenario_text.value:
Aoi, is something wrong? You don’t look so
good.

No, I’m okay. Just a little tired, that’s
all.

I’m glad we found Saki and the others, but
seeing what happened to the professor,

and that horrible fog... It feels like we’ve
been through a lot in an awfully short time.

(I know exactly how Aoi feels, and it’s not
like I can tell her to just get over it.)

Well, don’t be too hard on yourself.
If you’re tired, you should rest!

Agumon’s right, Aoi. Do you want to lie down?
Is there anything I can do for you?

Thank you, both of you. Actually, Labramon,
there is something you could do...
Would you...let me pet your tail?

I’ve wanted to this whole time! It looks so
warm and soft, I bet it’s super fluffy!
Hmm... Okay. Just be gentle with it, okay?
Of course! You know I will. Thanks, Labramon!

(Just watching them, Aoi grinning while
Labramon looks so conflicted, is comforting.)

What is it? Can’t you see I’m busy playing
with Aoi?!
